title: Originalite
subtitle: React / NodeJS
description: This online cloth shop was designed and created by the team of four developers as E-commerse project
technologies: Node.js/ Express/ passport/ MongoDB/ mongoose/ jsonwebtoken
React.js/ Redux/ Sass/ styled-components/ redux-thunk/ swiper/ react-icons/ react-router-dom/ jwt-decode/ framer-motion/ formik/ yup/ @reduxjs/toolkit/ redux-persist/ eslint
features: Full-stack JavaScript application development using Node.js for the backend and React.js for the frontend, ensuring a seamless development experience.
Secure authentication and authorization processes implemented with passport, jsonwebtoken, and JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for enhanced security and user session management.
State management in React applications streamlined with Redux, @reduxjs/toolkit, and redux-persist, enabling efficient data flow and state persistence across sessions.
Advanced UI development with React.js, utilizing styled-components and Sass for modular and customizable styling, alongside framer-motion for smooth animations.
Efficient form handling and validation in React applications with Formik and Yup, providing a user-friendly form experience and reducing development time.
Dynamic and responsive user interfaces designed with swiper for touch sliders and react-icons for scalable iconography, enhancing user interaction and visual appeal.
Single Page Application (SPA) routing handled with react-router-dom, offering a seamless and interactive user experience without page reloads.
Code quality and maintainability ensured with eslint, helping to identify and fix problems in JavaScript code, adhering to best practices.
Secure and scalable API development with Express, leveraging MongoDB and mongoose for robust data storage and management, facilitating complex data operations.
Client-side security features with jwt-decode for decoding JSON Web Tokens, ensuring secure transmission of user information.
